projectPurpose: To provide a highly secure, decentralized, and trust-minimized infrastructure for cross-chain communication and asset transfer, specifically designed for decentralized finance (DeFi) applications and aiming to connect various blockchain ecosystems (including EVM and IBC chains) without relying on trusted intermediaries.
mainFeatures: Designed for censorship resistance and extremely high security
Supports general message passing, asset transfers, NFTs, and DeFi
Based on consensus verification, no dependencies on trusted third parties, oracles, multi-signatures, or MPC
Uses Zero-Knowledge Cryptography and BLS signatures
Implements IBC for compatibility with Cosmos chains and connects to EVM chains
Native transfer of any asset to any chain
Overcomes sovereign bridging trilemma (speed, ubiquity, ownership)

marketPositioning: Union positions itself as a cutting-edge, highly secure, and decentralized cross-chain bridging and interoperability protocol. Its primary differentiator is its deep reliance on zero-knowledge cryptography and consensus verification for trust minimization, explicitly avoiding traditional trusted third parties, oracles, multi-signatures, or MPC for core validation. This focus on trustlessness and censorship resistance, combined with its hyper-efficient ZK proving system and support for both EVM and IBC chains, targets the DeFi market and users prioritizing the highest levels of security and decentralization compared to alternative bridging solutions that may employ different trust assumptions like validator networks or MPC schemes.
